notesStmt.note: Fragments from two of the prayers commonly found at the end of the Seliḥot service, מרן די בשמיא and מכניסי רחמים. In both, the version found here presents numerous variations from the common version; Text breaks are signified by a sof pasuḳ and a paragraph break; verso bears scribbling in Arabic characters.
Condition: recto only; torn from top and bottom; verso bears scribbling in Arabic characters.
